quotations.quotation: all programs have bugs.
We only see what we know.
You won't make it this way.
Fly without wings; Dream with open eyes; See in darkness.
Don’t worry if it doesn’t work right. If everything did, you’d be out of a job.
Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
Can you see me ?
Move fast, break things.
Unity is strength, division is weakness.
If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
Are you sure that way ?
Left or right ?.
I’ve finally learned what ‘upward compatible’ means. It means we get to keep all our old mistakes.
Let he who has a bug free software cast the first stone.
This bug is so annoying!
Any sufficiently advanced bug is indistinguishable from a feature.
If something doesn't work as expected, just turn it off !
There are two ways to write error-free programs; only the third one works.
If at first you don't succeed, call it version 1.0
Sometimes it pays to stay in bed in Monday, rather than spending the rest of the week debuging Monday's code.
Do it again. Never give up !
If anything can go wrong, it will go wrong.
Do not wait until the conditions are perfect to begin. Beginning makes the conditions perfect.
A pinch of probability is worth a pound of perhaps.
Do not panic your phone will be fine XD.
You can see a lot by just looking.
Sometimes it takes a wrong turn to get you to the right place.
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
If you can't do it by yourself why don't you ask someone else to do it for you ?
I don’t care if it works on your machine! We are not shipping your machine!
